cityOrState:
Scottsville -lined out- M.E. Church -lined out - John Croft - lined out-
Rochester 8 miles
car buggy- worst old plank
road & mud ever seen- Sister
Hannah's hand better- Gula
weaker- it is dreadful to see a
loved one just sliding down
& no power to stay the disease
summaryText: Susan B. Anthony writes about her visit to Scottsville and Rochester and the condition of her loved ones.
